verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: alienated] [ARG1: the United States’ closest allies] [ARGM-LOC: at the Group of Seven summit in Canada] [ARGM-MNR: with his aggressive trade declarations and surprising suggestion that Russia be readmitted to the exclusive club of major economic powers] .

President Trump alienated the United States’ closest allies at the Group of Seven summit in Canada with his aggressive trade declarations and surprising suggestion that Russia [V: be] readmitted to the exclusive club of major economic powers .

President Trump alienated the United States’ closest allies at the Group of Seven summit in Canada with his aggressive trade declarations and surprising suggestion that [ARG1: Russia] be [V: readmitted] [ARG2: to the exclusive club of major economic powers] .
